mutants.code:
import re

def clean_html(html: str) -> str:
    html = html.replace('', '\n')
    html = re.sub('<br\\s*/?>', '\n', html)
    html = re.sub('<.*?>', ' ', html)
    html = re.sub(' +', ' ', html)
    html = '\n'.join([x.strip() for x in html.splitlines()])
    return html.strip()
